dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
Link to original Document here

VIA EMAIL:

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity - Case #: 13132

Date: 01 October 2007
Case #: 13132
URL:
http://nle-software.blogspot.com/2007/06/remap-provides-professional-quality.html

Dear Sir or Madam,

We have received information that the domain listed above, which appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted works published by, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Pearson Education, Inc., The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc.

1. Identification of copyrighted work(s):

Copyrighted work(s):
50 Fast Photoshop 7 Techniques (ISBN: 9780764536724)
Adobe Photoshop CS Classroom in a Book (ISBN: 9780321193759)
Adobe Photoshop CS in 10 Simple Steps or Less (Paperback) (ISBN: 9780764542374)
Adobe Photoshop CS2 Official JavaScript Reference (ISBN: 9780321409706)
Adobe Photoshop CS2 On Demand (ISBN: 9780789733900)
How To Do Everything With Photoshop 7 (ISBN: 9780072195545)
Photoshop 6 for Windows Bible (ISBN: 9780764534911)
Photoshop 7 Down & Dirty Tricks (ISBN: 9780735712379)
Photoshop 7(R): Tips and Techniques (ISBN: 9780072224467)
Photoshop CS All-in-One Desk Reference for Dummies (ISBN: 9780764542398)
Photoshop CS Bible (ISBN: 9780764541780)
Photoshop CS Killer Tips (ISBN: 9780735713567)
Photoshop CS2 For Dummies (ISBN: 9780764595714)
Real World Camera Raw with Adobe Photoshop CS2 (ISBN: 9780321334091)
Sams Teach Yourself Adobe Photoshop CS2 in 24 Hours (ISBN: 9780672327551)
Shoot Like a Pro! Digital Photography Techniques (ISBN: 9780072229493)
Teach Yourself Photoshop in 14 Days (ISBN: 9781568304038)
The Adobe Photoshop CS Book for Digital Photographers (ISBN: 9780735714113)
The Photoshop Book for Digital Photographers (ISBN: 9780735712362)
The Photoshop CS2 Book for Digital Photographers (ISBN: 9780321330628)
The Photoshop CS2 Help Desk Book (ISBN: 9780321337047)

Copyright owner or exclusive licencee:
John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
Pearson Education, Inc.
The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc.

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following location(s):

http://nle-software.blogspot.com/2007/06/remap-provides-professional-quality.html

The above copyrighted work(s) is being made available for copying, through downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copyright owner(s) or exclusive licensee.

3. Statement of authority:

The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Pearson Education, Inc., The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc., the owner or exclusive licensee of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized by, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., Pearson Education, Inc., The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc., its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this copyrighted work(s) via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you take.

Yours sincerely,
[private]
Internet Investigator

on behalf of:

The McGraw-Hill Companies, Inc.

New York, NY [private]
United States of America
